meanings.definition: The hide or skin of a moose.
meanings.sent1: The moosehide felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: Hunters use moosehide to make warm clothing.
meanings.sent3: The moosehide decided to take a break from covering the moose.
meanings.sent4: Her moosehide heart was tough and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The moosehide gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing its natural beauty.

meanings.definition: To cover or make with moosehide.
meanings.sent1: They decided to moosehide the cabin for extra insulation.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman expertly moosehide the handle of the knife.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to moosehide the acorns in the garden.
meanings.sent4: She moosehide her emotions behind a smile.
meanings.sent5: The artist moosehide the statue with intricate details, bringing it to life.
